DOC.brief_summary: The aim trial compare two different endometrial priming protocol - woman receive oral estrogen - woman receive transdermal estrogen
DOC.criteria: Women 1850 year old desire child need embryo transfer . Plasma prolactin less 30 . Uterine cavity allow pregnancy , body mass index 2030 . And sign consent inform . History estrogen dependent cancer , unknown origin vaginal bleeding . Ovarian cyst . Contraindications pregnant . Estrogen allergy .
